// src/components/Graph/Controls.jsx import React from 'react'; const Controls = ({ onAddNode, onDeleteNode, onAddEdge, onDeleteEdge, onStartDFS, onPauseDFS, onUndoDFS, onResetGraph, isRunning, isPaused, delay, setDelay, }) => (
setDelay(Number(e.target.value))} min="100" step="100" />
); export default Controls;
